page.title: 01CRICKET ST.THOMAS-THE AREA
page.content: This area is quite high reaching a height of over 220m.The main A30 road runs through the block following the ridge of the Windwhistle Hill.To the North of the main road there is mostly farmland with some woodland.To the South of the main road is a large area of farmland-mostly given over to pasture for dairy cattle and sheep, although there is some mixed woodland too.There is also the estate of Cricket St.Thomas which has now become a wildlife park.It consists of a large country house with gardens and grounds covering 2 sq.kilometres.
